attributes.action: as the United Kindom, to take a stronger stance in international business and affairs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are WE in Iraq? Why are WE in Afghanistan? Why do WE have to follow the Americans everywhere they go?  We were the srongest nation in the world for a reason, at ONE TIME, but now we must look at the bigger picture. We fight in wars that only partially concern us.  In return, we must deal with the hatred of terrorists with the SAME NATIONALITY as us.  Let us be a decisive nation, based on the wants of the nation.
